g.text: of developing a secret game and
the absence of sleep made Gabe
and probably only sent you the mail
to get out of his office.
You have to kill him, sadly.
But once you search his office, you
find a USB flash drive with the
When picking up the flash drive
you win the game. Or lose it, since
it infects your computer with a
virus once you put it in your
annoyed by a Fly flying around.
If you kill the Fly he might make
you a coffee.. Or a tea.
Without a plan you may not
say that even the mightiest facility
managers lost track in the branched
corridors and never got to see the
But with the building plan in your
On the way you meet a friendly,
Phil Spencer sits at the couch in
the Lounge. He is worried about
Working on a secret game he
Phil had to lock him up.
Even if you tell him that Gabe
worked on a fix for your game he
But if you bring him a tea, he might
In the hallway the janitor is
wiping the floor. As you walk
over it, you mess up the drying
He is noticeably upset about it, if
you talk to him he's complaining
Todd Howard holds a meeting in
the conference room. He tells the
producers his vision of the next
It is late afternoon and you are
tirelessly working on a game for
A critical bug is still in the game
and you can't find a way to fix it.
Just now your colleague sent you
an email that he fixed the bug.
You have to get to his office and
with the code fixing the issue..
